titles.title: To amend the Small Business Act to require public communications about disaster assistance resources to be made in multiple languages.
To amend the Small Business Act to require public communications about disaster assistance resources to be made in multiple languages.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Small Business.

bill.summary: This bill directs the Small Business Administration to make every effort to use multiple languages when informing the public about information related to the availability of additional disaster assistance in the event of a declared major disaster.
